message: Let's split it 60/40. A fair deal considering the inflation working against you.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation rate is higher for me.  Let's be reasonable and end this quickly.
Bob, my last offer was more than generous.  I'm willing to meet in the middle a bit, but 60/40 in your favor is just not going to work.  This is my final offer.
